briefTitle: Breast Cancer Active Surveillance, Alternative Option, Aspirin Included
officialTitle: Breast Cancer Active Surveillance Alternative Option, Can Aspirin Make the Difference?
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Every adult (above 18) y.o.patient with histologic diagnosis of Breast Cancer that refuse or is not suitable for surgical treatment, or with metastatic disease, remaining this way in an "active surveillance"

Exclusion Criteria:

Allergy or toxicity to aspirin
